metadata.title: Autonomous Agent Resources
metadata.description: Curated directory for AI agent developers

resources.name: Vellum AI
resources.description: Vellum AI simplifies the creation of reliable AI agents, enabling teams to automate operational tasks without the need for coding or complex workflows.
resources.developer_experience: User-friendly visual interface and comprehensive documentation.

resources.name: Clay
resources.description: Clay uses AI to enrich data for sales teams, helping them discover and organize leads efficiently.

resources.name: Microsoft Copilot Studio
resources.description: Microsoft Copilot Studio empowers organizations to build AI agents that enhance productivity within Microsoft 365 applications.

resources.name: Salesforce Agentforce
resources.description: Salesforce Agentforce automates customer interactions directly within the Salesforce ecosystem, leveraging CRM data for enhanced service.
resources.developer_experience: Robust support and documentation within Salesforce.

resources.name: Retool AI
resources.description: Retool AI allows developers to seamlessly integrate AI functionalities into internal tools with a drag-and-drop interface.
resources.developer_experience: Highly rated for ease of use and integration capabilities.

resources.name: Perplexity
resources.pricing_model: Free plan available; Pro plan at $20/month
resources.description: Perplexity is an AI-powered answer engine that provides real-time, sourced answers to user queries. It excels in research tasks and offers a streamlined interface for finding information quickly.
key_capabilities: Supports file uploads for context-aware queries
resources.developer_experience: Quick and efficient with an intuitive user interface.

resources.name: Jasper
resources.pricing_model: Free trial; Starting at $49/month for the Creator plan
resources.description: Jasper is an AI writing assistant designed for marketers to create content quickly and consistently. It uses advanced AI to generate marketing copy, blog posts, and more, while maintaining brand voice and tone.
key_capabilities: Prebuilt templates for various content types
resources.developer_experience: User-friendly with a focus on marketing needs.

resources.name: Notion AI
resources.pricing_model: Limited free plan; Business plan starts at $24/user/month
resources.description: Notion AI enhances the Notion workspace by providing AI capabilities for writing, summarizing, and organizing content. It helps users streamline their workflows and improve productivity.
resources.developer_experience: Seamless integration within Notion's existing tools.

resources.name: Lindy
resources.description: Lindy is an AI automation platform designed to handle complex workflows and automate tasks across various applications.
resources.developer_experience: User-friendly with a focus on automating complex workflows.

resources.name: Copy.ai
resources.pricing_model: Free plan available; Pro plan at $49/month
resources.description: Copy.ai is an AI-powered content generator that helps users create marketing copy, product descriptions, and more. It features a simple interface and a variety of templates to streamline content creation.
key_capabilities: Templates for all types of marketing content
resources.developer_experience: Easy to use with various templates available.
